courseSelection.title: Select a course to create a quiz for
courseSelection.description: Here are the courses we found where you have a teacher role.
courseSelection.chooseDescription: Choose the course where you want to generate quiz questions from the module materials.
courseSelection.noCoursesDescription: You don't have any courses where you are enrolled as a teacher. Please check your Canvas account or contact your administrator.
courseSelection.devWarning: During development, only courses with certain prefixes are shown. Contact us if you would like to test with other courses.

quizTitle.label: Quiz Title
quizTitle.description: This is the quiz title shown in Canvas and when browsing quizzes. You can modify it before continuing.

moduleSelection.title: Select modules to include in the quiz
moduleSelection.description: Choose which course modules you want to generate quiz questions from. You can select multiple modules.
moduleSelection.skipHint: For instance, you can skip including modules with administrative details.
moduleSelection.noModulesDescription: This course doesn't have any modules yet. Please add some content to the course in Canvas before generating a quiz.
moduleSelection.noCourseSelectedDescription: Please go back to the previous step and select a course first.
moduleSelection.addManualModuleDescription: Upload PDF files or paste text content to create a custom module

questionConfig.title: Configure Question Types per Module
questionConfig.description: Add question batches for each module. Each batch can have a different question type, count (1-20 questions), and difficulty level (max 4 batches per module).
questionConfig.largeCountMessage: Large number of questions may take longer to generate.
questionConfig.noModulesSelected: No modules selected. Go back to select modules first.
questionConfig.tip: Tip: Mix different question types and difficulty levels to create comprehensive assessments. Each module can have up to 4 different question batches with 1-20 questions each.

manualModule.title: Add Manual Module

moduleName.label: Module Name
moduleName.placeholder: Enter a name for this module

manualModule.contentMethod: How would you like to add content for this module?
manualModule.uploadPdfDescription: Upload PDF documents (lecture notes, transcripts, etc.)

fileUpload.title: Upload PDF Files
fileUpload.dropzone: Click to upload or drag and drop
fileUpload.restrictions: PDF files only, up to 5 files, 5MB each, 25MB total
fileUpload.maxFilesError: Maximum {{max}} files allowed per manual module
fileUpload.invalidTypeError: Only PDF files are supported. Invalid file: {{name}}
fileUpload.totalSizeError: Total file size exceeds maximum limit

textContent.title: Enter Text Content
textContent.description: Enter the content you want to generate questions from. This could be lecture notes, course materials, or any educational text content.

contentPreview.title: Content Preview
contentPreview.processingHint: This may take a few seconds
